name: Innofied Solution
description:
Innofied is an Award-Winning mobile & web app development company having offices in New York, San Francisco, Australia and India.
With 100+ team members, we've been creating amazing products for Startups to Fortune 500 & those apps were loved by millions, won numerous awards, were featured in different medias & brought great revenues.
🔵 We've built more than 600 apps that
Ranked Top 3 charts several times in the App Stores
Brought revenues worth $400+ million for our customers
80+ clients acquired and/or raised VC funding after working with us.
🔵 Awards & Recognition
NASSCOM East Award
PRSI Award of Excellence in App Development '16, '17
ASSOCHAM Award, '17
WASME Excellence Award, '17
🔵 View Our Success Stories
Visit => innofied.com/case-study
🔵 Client Testimony
"I put my team up against any other team of developers in the Bay." - Director, VSP Global
“I wish every software developer were like them. The team is open and honest, and I absolutely trust them" - CEO, BeMup
🔵 What We Do
Product Strategy
Wireframing, Prototype & MVP
UX Design
Web App Development
iOS Development
Android Development
AR, VR, IOT Development
Quality Assurance & Testing
🔵 Special Plan For Startups
We work with numerous startups and we have an Agile Startup Ready™ process that helps startups conceptualize & launch product in less time and much affordably.
READ MORE...
